hero.title: Welcome to your new web app!
hero.description: Built whatever you like with supastarter. We are sure it's gonna be awesome.

features.title: Features
features.description: Everything you need to build your next web application!

highlights.1: Ready to use authentication with supabase
highlights.2: Email and password, magic link and all supported OAuth providers
highlights.3: All authentication components (login, signup, password reset, profile) included

highlights.1: next-i18next integrated to support full internationalization
highlights.2: All components prepared to be translated
highlights.3: Translation flow ready to used with translation management tool or in VSCode via i18n-ally.

highlights.1: tanstack-query included to enable caching and easy refetching
highlights.2: Auto-generated types from supabase schema for typed data fetching
Ready-to-use templates for all supabase email notifications

highlights.3: ESLint and Prettier ready to be used
Chakra UI theme is easy to extend

highlights.1: Built to be used with serverless platforms like Vercel

pricing.description: We research and develop AI and how it can be used to build new experiences for everyday people
pricing.title: Spark Membership
